petNameAdd:
1) STATE OF ASSAM
    Advocate - Tapan Kumar Bhattacharya

business_details.Business: Accused Sanowar Hussain has been produced from jail hajot. Seen the accused. Accused is examined u/s 313 Cr.P.C and his statement is recorded where he declined to adduce evidence in defence.Heard argument for both sides. Judgment delivered in the open court. The prosecution has failed to prove its case u/s 4 of POCSO Act against the accused beyond all reasonable doubt. Held, the accused is not guilty u/s 4 of POCSO Act.Accordingly, the accused is acquitted and set at liberty. Since, the accused Sanowar Hussain is in jail hajot, he be allowed to go on bail of Rs 15,000/- with one surety of like amount. In default, accused Sanowar Hussain will be in jail custody for another period of 6 months.The case is disposed of.
